Reviews.Title: Two thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Danielle Depaulis
Reviews.Content: By far my favorite cases. Speck has always been a good brand. Very lightweight but protective at the same time. I recommend this case to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Rachel Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: It was exactly what I wanted.  And I got very quickly after I ordered it. Couldn't be happy with it

Reviews.Title: Yay
Reviews.Author: mommii
Reviews.Content: It's a nice phone case. Heavy duty, protects well against drops. Has a nice stand, I'm happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Alexa Reyes
Reviews.Content: Super slim case that offers excellent protection. Would recommend to anyone with an iPhone 5 who dislikes the bulkiness of an otterbox.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: shannon ring
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I liked my speck for my old iphone. This was a fantastic deal. I think I paid less than $9 for it here, compared to $40 at best buy. awesome purchase!

Reviews.Title: Speck
Reviews.Author: Cmts
Reviews.Content: I love speck products. They never let me down. I love the colors on this case as well. I recommend this case!
